website_summaries.verdict: Do you like chocolate mint candy, cookies, or ice cream? If so, these protein bars are likely to impress you.
pros: Scrumptious combination of chocolate and mint that reminds consumers of chocolate mint candy or ice cream
Fans say these bars satisfy their cravings for sweets
Does not contain soy or gluten
cons: Anyone who is sensitive to mint may not like them

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like struggle
customer_reviews.text: So let me preface by saying I don't usually eat protein bars. However, I was overcome with blind optimism at the high number of glowing reviews this bar received that I decided in the middle of my late night shopping spree to get this in addition to the quest crisps (which are fantastic btw!) After my first bite, I knew I had made a terrible, terrible mistake. I am now left feeling confused about the type of people who would enjoy such a bar and even worse, a full box of this protein bar that I cannot stomach (pun intended). Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: FrankiiE

customer_reviews.title: Love the smores quest bars!
customer_reviews.text: These were great! Quest bars are always good, but I recently tried the smores flavor and I was pleasantly surprised. I like quest for their low carb/high protein ingredients, which make for a good pre or post workout. There are chunks of chocolate and graham crackers, so that takes away from the protein bar texture. It's a toss up between smores and chocolate chip cookie dough for my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious mint flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love it. But I used to get it from Amazon without their "pantry" shipping costs - Amazon Prime. Why did they take that away? This is a great evening snack - high in fiber for me. I also like the chunky style - makes me feel I am biting into something and not just dieting on liquid stuff or salads.
customer_reviews.author: D-C

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein bar ( Quest & any flavor ) with 20g that I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite flavor that has the protein and fiber and such a small amount of sugar that it is easy to clean your teeth to prevent those cavities from forming. Quest bars are the best snack and other flavors are so good. You might want to get the variety pack at first with 1 each from all the flavors to decide what you want to have 12 of. My 2nd favorite is the Chocolate Peanut Butter. There are times that I will eat a LaraBar or a protein drink instead...just for the variety.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lacey

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite protein bars!
customer_reviews.text: These protein bars taste great! As with any protein bars they can be a little dry but these are one of the better tasting ones. One thing I love to do with these is cut it into little squares and put it in the oven or microwave for a short period and it melts a little then when it starts to cool it is like cookies!
customer_reviews.author: Joe and Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Satisfying meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: A good meal replacement for when one is on the run. Does not raise blood sugars as many energy or granola bars do so is a good option for diabetics. a
customer_reviews.author: Cherie C. Binns MSCN

customer_reviews.title: Great macros.... Fantastic replacement for carb heavy junk food!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Quest for saving me again from my sweet tooth! These are AMAZING! Are they mint chocolate Oreos. No! Are they anywhere near as carbodeadly??? 100% NO! Are they a fantastic replacement? Better than that! I have turned on my non-low carb friends to these and even they like them!!! My next one to give a try.... The coconut chocolate one! Fingers crossed they are as delicious as these!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Rava

customer_reviews.title: Effective Nutrisystem Snack Replacement
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bars for curving hunger! I was previously on the Nutrisystem diet and have substituted their snack bars for these and have been able to maintain the diet effectively without re-purchasing the Nutrisystem package. My all-time favorite flavor is the Mint Chocolate Chunk. I recommend these to all of my girlfriends for on-the-go snacks.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Hits the spot with chocolate need while not blowing my sugar or other levels.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many boxes of these. They are to compensate for my chocolate and sweet fix in the middle of the day and get me through "didn't eat" parts of the day without drinking even more caffeine or finding some sweet sugary bad for me item.
customer_reviews.author: R. N.

customer_reviews.title: Open bars in box
customer_reviews.text: I found a bar that was already opened in the box I ordered. That’s disgusting and highly disappointing, as I now no longer trust to eat any of the bars in the box. Throwing them out. Thanks for robbing me of almost $30. Will never order from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Hazheen Shirnekhi

customer_reviews.title: Good product, lousy shipping
customer_reviews.text: I like these bars, but the box was packaged in a shipping envelope, with no protection. It was mangled and it had obviously been sitting in a hot truck for a while before reaching me. The bars had melted slightly, and I had to put them in the fridge for an hour or so to firm them up a little. Quality and price of the product itself: A+. Quality of packaging and shipping: D.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good. I’ve read Quest has a ton of bad sweeteners in it’s products but because I don’t know that for sure, I won’t change my stars because of it. All protein bars aren’t as good as real food but Quest does seem to be the best out of all protein bar companies. Some other reviews said the fruit flavors tasted weird but I liked them so it just depends on the person.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Weber

customer_reviews.title: A very nice protein bar
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned because I thought that this wouldn't be a whey-based protein bar due to my suspected allergy, but I guess I may have been wrong, since I didn't have any reaction after two weeks of eating these. The flavor at first is kind of weird, but it REALLY grows on you fast - I suggest eating it directly after your workout to associate the flavor with the pleasure of being finished. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F.

customer_reviews.title: These were stale and tasted like they had been sitting around awhile
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge quest bar fan, so I’m used to eating them on a regular basis. I usually order them from their website but went through amazon since I was already buying things. These were stale and tasted like they had been sitting around awhile. They should be nice and soft but these were more on the hard side.
customer_reviews.author: mike wayand

customer_reviews.title: Love at first bite!!
customer_reviews.text: These are simply fantastic! I've tried several flavors of these Protein bars, and these are my new favorite! Also, Quest brand Protein bars are recommended in the book "It's Only Food" by trainer Joe Olliges . His book is about helping you on a path to weight loss and healthy living.
customer_reviews.author: just my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Yummmm
customer_reviews.text: These... Are.. DELICOUS. being keto it sucks finding anything that will curb that swert tooth. Im here to say these was actually TO sweet, a whole bar at least. So i cut it in half, plus someone said yiu can bake them an make lil wee cookies. Im about that life!! But these are a need to keep on hand for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Stac

customer_reviews.title: Cardboard or sawdust? Nothing, nothing, nothing like pic on box.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't decide if it wasotr like cardboard or like sawdust. The bar is yellow-ish and not appealing. If we eat with eyes first, we will lose weight with these bars. If we closed our eyes, we would use our sense of smell as step 1 of eating. They smell fine. Then we bite in. Then, we want to hurry to chew so we could take a drink of something to wash the taste away. I will never buy again. The picture on box, shown here on Amazon, shows a very appealing s'more. Bar looks and tastes nothing like the picture. Rather misleading, eh?
customer_reviews.author: Eliz Shay

customer_reviews.title: Bars are always hard
customer_reviews.text: I seem to revert to ordering these by the case from amazon because it is by the far the best deal around, especially when you select flavors you like that are extra low-priced. These were the chocolate mint cookies, and the bars are always hard from amazon. I like getting them at the local grocery where i can do a "squeeze test" on them before i put them in my basket.
customer_reviews.author: SnowMamaVT

customer_reviews.title: They taste great!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a snack or a meal replacement this is what you need. It is so tasty and filling. It will keep you from feeling hungry for hours. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Package should be marked as perishable!
customer_reviews.text: Although this product is a favorite of mine and my husband’s, it arrived a melted, gooey mess. I feel that a “perishable” labeling should have been on the package or at least a warning. This package obviously sat in the sun and heat and therefore is inedible! What a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: L. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Not tasty at all
customer_reviews.text: Tried these, as finding chocolate mint bars are difficult, but is the flavor that we find we prefer in this house. Everyone in this household tried one, and couldn't even stomach it to finish. Texture is a bit odd, it smells like chocolate mint, and the 1st initial taste is a little mint, but after a second or two of the taste it goes to an odd bland taste of nothing. We ended up tossing the remainder of the 12 pack
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: about 12.5 pounds to 15 pounds a month.
customer_reviews.text: Doing Keto, had a physical, and things were great, losing 12.5 to 15 pounds a month, two months, I grab a few bars when I don't prepare for the day, and then have some meat and lettuce based salad at night. Don't feel very hungry at work, so they actually do fill the role of a meal replacement. Don't forget to do multivitamins when doing Keto. I'll write that again, while on Keto, using a lot of these, two a day some days, I had a physical, and my health has improved. IMPROVED.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful maple flavor
customer_reviews.text: I crave maple syrup but am on Keto diet. These are amazing and dirty Keto friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Raymond Costello

customer_reviews.title: Consistent
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been eating quest bars for a long time, but the blueberry bar is one of the only flavors that has not changed its taste on me. You know how sometimes the quest bars can taste almost like a vitamin? The blueberry flavor is always solid
customer_reviews.author: Safshort

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Tasty
customer_reviews.text: For a protein bar, these are great. Really, I would say this is the best protein bar I've ever tasted and definitely the best Quest bar flavor I've tasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Smores is a no go. Will try another flavor before I blame the brand
customer_reviews.text: I don't write reviews much unless somethings really good or bad. Unfortunately this was not so good. Flavor- Smores Appearance- Peanut butter colored yellowish brown Taste- Literally tastes like a sweaty armpit smells. Funky stuff. I ate one thinking it would get better after a few bites..nope Had to reload and go for another one, to make sure I dont like it. I wish I would've went with another flavor like birthday cake or something. Heads up though never bought any "atkins" diet brand but their cookies and cream protein bars are kickin they are good. I will probably try another box of this brand but this ones going in the trash probably. It's no good
customer_reviews.author: Rc3439

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for the savings!
customer_reviews.text: Just as fresh as you would get them in your local market, but for a much better price! Smore's is one of my favorite flavors as well (next is chocolate mint). Great if you are doing Keto as well.
customer_reviews.author: RockyMtnGrrl70

customer_reviews.title: Glob of mush when opened!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought other flavors of Quest bars that are very good. These maple waffle bars are not, and were a glob of mush when opened. They were misshaped and looked like they had been stored on their sides and left in the heat to melt before delivery. Getting the wrapper off is tough and leaves your hands with a sticky residue that does not wipe off easily. Avoid these bars unless you are able to keep moist hand cleaning wipes with you while eating. The birthday cake bars are excellent without the sticky, gooey mess.
customer_reviews.author: W. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived expired
customer_reviews.text: The box shipped to me is 2 months past the "best by" date, and they're definitely stale. Won't be eating these unfortunately, and there's no return option.
customer_reviews.author: Merc

customer_reviews.title: Good source of protein and my favorite flavor is the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good source of protein and my favorite flavor is the smores. This is a protein bar, it does not taste like candy and should not be expected to. If you are looking for a good protein source with not too many carbs this is a good choice. I purchased a few bars at the grocery store to try flavors before purchasing a box, the smores was the best flavor for me.
customer_reviews.author: mhcal

customer_reviews.title: One of the best low-carb snacks out there
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most low-carb snacks, the flavors of these bars actually do taste like the flavors you see on the labels, and their nutrition facts are even more delicious. These are phenomenal, truly.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: The worst
customer_reviews.text: I post the photo to show how deceiving the wrapper photos are compared to what the bar looks like. There was zero mint flavor and the taste was disgusting. I didn't finish eating the bar it was that awful. Beware, this is a non returnable item because it is food!
customer_reviews.author: Angie H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing keto bars!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first flavor I've tried so far but I absolutely loved them. Really great keto protein bar. I just bought some other flavors so we'll see how they compare. Also FYI every so often I check the quest items on Amazon cause their prices change frequently. Like I bought this pack for ~$17 and then I checked recently and they're now back to ~$22 like a lot of other flavors. So if you're like me and not picky about flavors but just want a decently priced quest bar, then just look around at all the flavors as at least one flavor is generally down in the ~$17 price range.
customer_reviews.author: Bpo44

customer_reviews.title: Gross, overpriced high protien option
customer_reviews.text: I took two bites and could not force myself to eat this. And I was starving. Just gross. I agree with another reviewer - tastes like struggle. The texture was bad, the sweetener was bad, the overall flavor was gross. I got the oatmeal chocolate chip. There are MUCH better low carb/high protein options out there. And this was super expensive. Not sure what I will do with the rest of this box!
customer_reviews.author: sjfinbr

customer_reviews.title: Great meal replacement/snack bar except for sickly sweet
customer_reviews.text: I like these - they provide a nice quick meal replacement. I mostly like them b/c they don't raise my bs too much -- I am diabetic and on a ketogenic diet. however, they taste so sickly sweet! I wish they were sweet but not soooooo sweet. I've found this to be the case with most Quest bars I've tried. They need to cut back on the sweetener a bit. I think these would taste too sweet to anyone, but especially for those of us who are eating no real sugar and only reduced sweetened things in general. (I wish I could also get 1/2 sweet tasting diet sodas!).
customer_reviews.author: Delphin Naio

customer_reviews.title: Size of bars have changed!
customer_reviews.text: Birthday cake flavor is one of the top flavors Quest has, & Im very happy with the shipping speed of Amazon. But, um, like, Quest, wth happened?? These bars are now 1/2 the thickness than they used to be. You should 1/2 down the prices too then, lmao.
customer_reviews.author: iamshopping

customer_reviews.title: Melted and squished
customer_reviews.text: These tasted ok for being what they are. Mine came melted and squished. So they are flat and I cant hardly get them out of the package. I really need to wear gloves because since they melted they are super sticky. I hate sticky. To expensive. I don't mind paying more for quality but this product is not quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Quality Assurance? Off box of Quest Bars
customer_reviews.text: This must have been a bad box. Two bars were open and they tasted a little off. We love these bars so I’m not sure what happened but definitely need better quality assurance
customer_reviews.author: Chase Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Chalky, sticky, taste after chewing.
customer_reviews.text: It may just be me, as I’ve got a sensitive palate when it comes to tasting protein powered.. but the first bite doesn’t taste as bad, a bit on the top sweet side for my liking, but by the second or third the texture of the chewed bar is thick and it has a weird protein chemical after taste. I’ve tried other flavors, and the texture at the end is the same, and they’re too sweet for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Processed Bar - Nothing like a S’more
customer_reviews.text: These do not taste like s’mores. It’s a very dense and processed product. Yes, it does have protein and can come in handy if you’re really in need. Be wary of the packaging imagery as opposed to the actual taste and consistency. It’s a processed to bar high on marketing and that’s the truth.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Marin

customer_reviews.title: Tastes pretty bad.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like them but they taste awful at least to me. I'd say get a variety pack to try out the flavors you want before getting a pack of 12. Oh well just gotta make it though 10 more bars before I try other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: coopman174

customer_reviews.title: Regular purchaser. The GOLD STANDARD of protein bars
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who's looked into protein supplements for a good amount of time knows that Quest bars are the gold standard of protein bars. They have one of the lowest carb/fat to protein ratio. They're not loaded with sugar like some other products so if you're looking to gain lean mass, this is the one for you. I always buy these in boxes every once in a while for the value, and because I know I'll finish the box. There are several recipes utilizing Quest bars that make them much more enjoyable. Definitely look into those if you're not satisfied with the original taste, but the Oreo taste is very easy for most people!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Quest bars
customer_reviews.text: I love Quest bars. Being diabetic, they are a great source of a meal, when running around, or at work! Flavor is good on these, but not my absolute favorite
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quest is good for weight management - and tasty too!
customer_reviews.text: On weight watchers plan, we can have Quest bars for 4 points. They are really good, high protein and low sugar. I usually eat them every morning with a cup of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: cls66

customer_reviews.title: Dense cookie dough?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a fan of the taste or texture. It's like dense cookie dough with a strong flavor. I guess I would prefer more carbs to balance it out since I'm looking for more of a meal in a bar. I bought with Oatmega bars which I liked better.
customer_reviews.author: mapletone

customer_reviews.title: Not tasty at all
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 3 stars solely because it’s packed with protein but the taste is completely gross and the bar is all sticky and stuck to the wrapper. I gave it to my friend because I just couldn’t do the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandra

customer_reviews.title: Sugar Craving gone
customer_reviews.text: This bar cuts my sugar cravings after the second bite. They are thick but not huge. They taste like real candy but without all the bad stuff your body doesn't need. If you want something that will sustain you for a few hours, try this!
customer_reviews.author: L. M.  Butler

customer_reviews.title: Safe & yummy ingredients for special diet needs.
customer_reviews.text: I'm grateful to find a chocolate mint protein bar that has 'clean' ingredients and has a decent taste. I will definitely buy the Quest bars again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy
customer_reviews.text: It's low sugar, high fiber and 20g of protein. The mint gives it a refreshing taste. I use it for a breakfast or an on the go pick me up.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Behl

customer_reviews.title: :( smells like baby formula
customer_reviews.text: the chocolate ones are decent , but they all smell like baby formula. The apple flavor taste like i have pennies and nickles in my mouth. The bits of fruit has the texture of paper stuck on it. I flavor lingers in your mouth you don't want to eat anything else.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Great bars
customer_reviews.text: Quest bars are very tasty. I really like this flavor. These are high quality bars and i would recommend. they are a little smaller than some other brands but the taste is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Tast a little wierd
customer_reviews.text: They taste a little funky due to the sucerlouse. But other than that there all right
customer_reviews.author: derek kreykes

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Quest Bars, especially the Birthday Cake flavor. It's by far the best textured bar, with the best flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fallacara

customer_reviews.title: chewy
customer_reviews.text: The bar is chewy and a little on the sweet side for my taste but is one of the best lo-carb bars I have found. They are pricey , so I use them as a treat. I will buy again
customer_reviews.author: ltejas

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. Great as meal replacement or snack. Not sugary like other bars. I keep buying when I see new flavors
customer_reviews.author: Risa

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of mint choc chip ice cream and this bar delivers! :)
customer_reviews.author: Adam A

customer_reviews.title: Great on-the-go protein bar
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by these. Do they taste as good as full sugar bars? No, of course not, but they tasted a lot better than what I expected. Like other reviewers, I had a couple that weren’t my favorites, but even my least favorite — S’Mores — was a good snack to eat when I didn’t have time to eat a full lunch & at only 4 net carbs, it fit great into my keto diet
customer_reviews.author: Julie S

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't finish 1 bar
customer_reviews.text: These taste like what I imagine astronauts would eat during a 2 year journey to mars. They might be protein packed and good for you, but I could not get past the taste/texture. I can normally eat anything and not be bothered by that stuff, but I do not recommend this smores flavored bars... Unless you are travelling to mars. Just thought of this one - they kind of look like the protein bars on the movie "Snowpiercer" - not very appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Since I’m so busy working full time and going to school full time, it’s hard to diet properly. This helps me stick to keto because I don’t have to stop somewhere for junk. Instead, I can have one of these bars for dinner and I’m set for the night! Some of these flavors are bleh, but I didn’t expect every one to be delicious
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: great properties, high protein low sugar compared to others ...
customer_reviews.text: every single kind is delicious, great properties, high protein low sugar compared to others but I do not find them substantial of crave killing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Fournier

customer_reviews.title: One of the top protein bar flavors
customer_reviews.text: I prefer fruity flavors and those are tough to come by in protein bars. This, along with the white chocolate and raspberry, are my two favorites. Low carb, and great taste.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hobart

customer_reviews.title: Decently flavored playdoh
customer_reviews.text: Ehh... has the texture of glued playdoh, but flavor is decent. Ok if you're too busy for lunch
customer_reviews.author: Mary Edgerly

customer_reviews.title: Love this Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love this flavor and it's only 4g net carbs. I eat a keto diet so the fewer the carbs the better and lots of the other flavors have 5g net carbs rather than 4. Good flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy big chocolate chunks
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite quest bars! Nice big chunks of chocolate. No aftertaste. My go-to dessert or afternoon snack. Filling because of protein but only a couple carbs. Great for weight loss program!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Sando

customer_reviews.title: Photo of Product is Deceptive
customer_reviews.text: I was dumb enough to think these were some form of what it showed on the package. They are just bars shaped nothing like a real S'more. I didn't like the taste at all. Should have returned them immediately.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and macros
customer_reviews.text: These taste great and have better macros than most other protein bars. You can find other brands that taste better, but the macros aren't good. And you can find others with better macros, but they taste terrible. Quest is the sweet spot if your priorities are flavor and macros. But if you're looking for something more "natural" and less processed, look elsewhere. Recently there have been lots of new brands of natural protein/ meal replacement bars flooding the market. However, they tend to be higher in carbs and fat, and lower in protein.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Way To Get Protien
customer_reviews.text: These bars have a lot of protein for not a crazy amount of calories. The taste is good-a bit of an acquired taste at first. There's a lot of fiber which is wonderful. Easy to put one in my purse and have a meal on the run. They are filling and last for a while. I ordered more and will continue to do so.
customer_reviews.author: gottaread

customer_reviews.title: Good protein bar
customer_reviews.text: After trying more than a dozen different protein bars, this is one of my top 3 because of high protein, low carbs and net carbs - also flavor. VERY sticky though.
customer_reviews.author: HF

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting something chewy like a cookie
customer_reviews.text: Was not at all what I was expecting. Based on the picture, I was expecting the texture of an oatmeal cookie. Far from it.
customer_reviews.author: Hattie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flavor!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite flavor of the quest protein bars. Bits of graham cracker, chunks of chocolate, and marshmallow swirled throughout the bar. They satisfy my cravings and are very filling.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S. Schmuck

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My fav!!! Keeps me full, not that weird protein taste
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's low carb and almost no sugar! My husband has a sensitive digestive system and found out the hard way that he cannot eat more than 1 per day.
customer_reviews.author: Angie M. Nunley

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: These taste like thick blocks of tar mixed with chalk, no mint or real chocolate at all and very heavy on sweetener I couldn't even finish a bar.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna M. Plummer

customer_reviews.title: a great tasting protein bar
customer_reviews.text: For once, a great tasting protein bar! Kept looking at the package to make sure it was legit! LOVE the LOW Sugar and simpe ingredients. Thanks Quest!
customer_reviews.author: HomeOwner

customer_reviews.title: Quest S'mores bars taste like modeling clay, with the same texture. CAN'T RETURN!
customer_reviews.text: Quest S'mores bars I ordered have a weird chemical taste, clay-like texture, and have absolutely nothing in common with a S'mores. The rotten cherry on top....NO RETURNS, even though it's a Prime purchase! Amazon is slowly devolving, on all fronts.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: You will love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this multiple times after tasting. Your kids will beg you to give them some. They will trade their kinder surprise for this. Amazing taste. And healthy ingredients. Perfect combo
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was more “minty”
customer_reviews.text: Another quest protein bar flavor I had yet to try. This one is pretty good, definitely tastes better than a lot of their other flavors. My only wish is that the mint flavor was stronger; as of now it’s only a tiny hint of mint instead of a more powerful minty taste. Overall, though, it keeps you full and it tastes pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: xSandblast

customer_reviews.title: chewy.
customer_reviews.text: these bars were too tough and chewy. I could not eat them. even my 19 yr old son did not like the texture. great flavor though.
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Another great favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: I love chocolate mint anything and this bar does not disappoint. Big chunks of chocolate cookie and mint swirled throughout the bar satisfies my chocolate sweet tooth.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S. Schmuck

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Cake in a Bar
customer_reviews.text: Okay, while it doesn't taste exactly like birthday cake, it's pretty good. It's also a lot better for you than actual birthday cake. Yet another great addition to the Quest Bar series.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Meal replacement bars.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of the mint chocolate chunk bars are my favorite. I don't always have time to eat breakfast and the bars are easy to take with you, I find them very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Normally a great product
customer_reviews.text: Quest is normally a great product, my last order of Birthday Cake was terrible, seemed like it had been sitting a storage room for months.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: These taste horrible
customer_reviews.text: These bars are high protein low calorie and low sugar, so it's no wonder they taste awful. The texture is that of kinetic sand and they all have the same too sweet taste. Try a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting. Wish I could return for a FULL refund. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I have eaten alot of protein bars and some were good and some were bad. These are the worst I have ever had, I ate one and threw the rest away.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Mostly delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love quest bars. However, some of them are very tasty while others taste like silly putty. The best ones are cookies and cream, Smores, white chocolate raspberry, and mint chocolate chip.
customer_reviews.author: kriddle

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I love quest bars and I usually like this chocolate mint one. But this shipment tasted stale and the date on is 12/20:(
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M.

customer_reviews.title: maple protein bars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't care for the taste at all but will eat them because I need more protein in my diet.
customer_reviews.author: KathyBEE

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Quest Protein Bars are one of my favorite. I always get the variety pack because I eat one every morning. They are chewy and not powdered like a lot of bars and are delicious to me.
customer_reviews.author: DWT

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These are really, really good. But, seriously addictive. It's kind of difficult for me to control myself, when eating these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne H

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Delicious & High in Protein
customer_reviews.text: Besides the Cookies & Cream, this Quest bar is my favorite. These bars taste so good that I have to doublecheck the nutritional facts on the package. It amazes me that it has 21g of protein, 1g sugar and 4g net carbs. They’re like a desert for me.
customer_reviews.author: TXChainsawKiller

customer_reviews.title: Coffee Flavor is nice
customer_reviews.text: I am not a coffee drinker but the flavor of this reminds me of the coffee smell. These are not too strong and it is nice to have mixed in with other flavors for my daily breakfast meal.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Glancy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again unless starving!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing about this tastes like oatmeal. The only benefit is that it fills you up and occasionally you bite into a delicious chocolate chip. It’s a very chewy minefield of questionable taste.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Wags

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor. Low Sugar
customer_reviews.text: Quest bars are my favorite protien bar. Lots of bars have alot of sugar, but all of theirs are under 2 grams. I also havr enjoyed all the flavors I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: jconroy

customer_reviews.title: Great nutrition bar!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is gluten free due to celiac disease. She survives on these bars at college for breakfast. She has been eating them for a few years before we knew we could buy them on Amazon (preferable). Too bad there isn't a flavor for me without dairy :(
customer_reviews.author: B. Katz

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but others tasted better
customer_reviews.text: This was harder than ones I purchased from another company. Not sure if the texture changed during shipping or not. Ones I tried before were softer and tasted fresher.
customer_reviews.author: tgoday

customer_reviews.title: but this one is probably the best imo.
customer_reviews.text: All the Quest bars taste awful, but this one is probably the best imo.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Tobias

customer_reviews.title: In between meals, or running late? Grab these, they will suffice
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious. Expensive. But I wish I was able to stop grabbing on, when running late to work. I don't see a stop to either, so they're delicious
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite flavor but gets job done
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite flavor from this company but gets the job done. Fills my void of protein with something that is not sickeningly sweet and is portable.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste of this quest bar and it has a sweetness and you are not eating sugar love it for a snack or a treat in the afternoon
customer_reviews.author: Anita

product_meta.title: Quest Nutrition Protein Bar, Mint Chocolate Chunk, 20g Protein, 4g Net Carbs, 200 Cals, High Protein Bars, Low Carb Bars, Gluten Free, Soy Free, 2.1 oz Bar, 12 Count

Made with complete, dairy-based protein isolates
20g protein, 4g net carbs, 1g sugar, 16g fiber per bar

Box contains 12 Mint Chocolate Chunk flavored Quest Bars
